3) The need to hide. Feeds that is. Nobody cares who did what in farmville and we want to hide the farmville feed. We shouldn't have to go to the browser for that. Seriously, firefox plus facebook toolbar is very nearly as cool as fishbowl so you need to support everything.
WorkItem.Summary: Add ability to hide people and pages from wall posts
